articles.title: Banquet Given in Presence of Kim Jong Un to Celebrate Successful Test-launch of Hwasong-14
articles.content:
Reception Given to Celebrate Successful Test-launch of Hwasong-14
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a splendid reception on Monday in celebration of the successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was present at the reception.
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials, scientists and technicians in the field of defense science who contributed to the successful test-launch of Hwasong-14.
					
					 Also attending there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials.
					
					 Kim Jong Un appeared at the reception hall of the Mokran House together with Ri Sol Ju and reviewed a guard of honor of the Ground, Naval and Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards together with those contributors.
					
					 Hwang Pyong So made a congratulatory speech at the reception.
					
					 Upon the authorization of Kim Jong Un, Hwang Pyong So warmly congratulated those in the field of defence science on rounding off the intercontinental ballistic rocket of Juche Korea, the powerful strategic weapon system of the Central Committee of the WPK and thus attaining the highest goal at one go in bolstering up the state nuclear force and devotedly defending the prestige of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 After making a strategic decision to put an end to seven decade-odd-year-long U.S. imperialists' nuclear threats to the Korean nation and all hostile forces' sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and round off intercontinental ballistic rocket targeting the heart of the U.S. without fail and thus open up the straight course for the final victory, the respected Supreme Leader has always shared joys and sorrows with the scientists and technicians in the field of defence science in the whole course of developing the rocket as the chief designer, chief manufacturer and political commissar of the group of developing Hwasong-14 although he was busy with all affairs of the Party, army and state, the speaker noted.
					
					 The days of developing and rounding off Hwasong-14 were the course during which the new strategic weapon was developed and created and, at the same time, the course during which the elite scientific research group, combat rank loyal to the WPK was born to perfectly develop any high-tech weapon system in the shortest period as demanded by the Party Central Committee, he said.
					
					 He underscored the need for the scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of defence science to uphold the Party's cause of building the Juche-oriented nuclear force with bigger practical success, bearing deep in mind today's glory and happiness.
					
					 He called for continuing to develop the Korean-style strategic weapon system, bolstering it both in quality and quantity, steadily consolidating the nuclear arsenal of Juche Korea and thus dealing a heavy blow to the U.S. and its vassal forces while not giving them a breathing spell until they bring the surrender document to the DPRK, and dynamically advancing toward the final victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					 A performance was given by the Moranbong Band at the reception.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Mexican Party Delegation
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Mexican Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by Ricardo Cantu Garza, coordinator of its National Coordinating Committee, on a visit to the DPRK on Tuesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Tuesday by Ricardo Cantu Garza, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the WPM who is heading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Members Do Friendly Work on Farm
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Members Do Friendly Work on Farm
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy did a friendly work at the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Vegetable Co-op Farm in Chollima District on Tuesday.
					 They helped the farmers in weeding vegetable fields.
					
					 They rendered aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Sojourn of Contributors to ICBM Test-Launch in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Sojourn of Contributors to ICBM Test-Launch in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Officials, scientists and technicians in the field of defense science, who made contribution to the successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic missile Hwasong-14, visited the Korean Revolution Museum.
					 At the general hall of the museum, they paid tribute to the art works depicting the images of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that it was built into the greatest revolutionary museum, they went round the historic relics and data on display.
					
					 They also toured the Natural History Museum and the Central Zoo.
					
					 And they spent a pleasant time at the Rungna People's Pleasure Park,  Rungna Dolphinarium and the Munsu Water Park.

articles.title: Army-People Gatherings Held in South Hwanghae Province to Celebrate Test-fire of ICBM Hwansong-14
articles.content:
Army-People Gatherings Held in South Hwanghae Province to Celebrate Test-fire of ICBM Hwansong-14
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Army-people gatherings took place in South Hwanghae Province and in cities and counties on Tuesday to celebrate the successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 Attending them were officials of the local party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 The report of the DPRK Academy of Defense Science as regards the successful test-launch of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 was read out by leading officials of the province, cities and counties.
					
					 The congratulatory speeches were made by officials of the party and armed forces organs and the youth league.
					
					 The speakers said with pride that the great success of Hwasong-14 is a signal manifestation of the heroic spirit of the great Paektusan nation which is dashing forward with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development and the strong military muscle, and the thrilling greatest victory in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years.
					
					 They congratulated the scientists and technicians in the field of the national defence upon the above-said successful test-fire true to the strategic plan and order of the party.
					
					 They called upon all other officials, party members and other working people to more dynamically turn out in the general advance of the great Mallima upswing to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with the great pride of demonstrating the might of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Young Vanguard Meet to Celebrate Successful Test-Launch of ICBM
articles.content:
Young Vanguard Meet to Celebrate Successful Test-Launch of ICBM
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting of young vanguard to celebrate the successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 took place at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre on Tuesday.
					 The speakers at the meeting extended congratulations to the scientists and technicians in the field of defence science on having succeeded in the test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 at one go with the fighting spirit and traits of realizing the intention and idea of the Workers' Party of Korea by devoting all their wisdom and energies.
					
					 They noted that the young vanguard, the advancing group of Songun revolution, will hold fast to the weapon of revolution and class and thoroughly protect the defence line of the country and the socialist system. When the U.S. imperialists and the traitors' group dare preempt attack, the young vanguard should not miss the opportunity to crush the aggressors with the treasured sword of Songun Korea's nuclear weapon and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail, they said.
					
					 They called for learning after the fighting spirit and traits of the scientists and technicians in the field of defence science and vigorously conducting the drive of breaking through the cutting edge and creating a series of new legendary tales about heroic youth in succession in every field for building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the WPK, officials concerned and those of the youth league, youth and students.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Hail Successful ICBM Test-Launch
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Hail Successful ICBM Test-Launch
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea met at the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District of Pyongyang Tuesday to celebrate the successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 Speakers at the meeting said that the successful test-launch was a striking demonstration of the heroic stamina and inexhaustible strength of the powerful Paektusan nation dashing ahead like the wind by dint of self-reliance and self-development and a great event to be specially recorded in the history of the dignified DPRK.
					
					 They recalled that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il built the independent defense industry from scratch and had worked heart and soul to provide eternal foundations for the development of the Juche-based rocket industry under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 They expressed heartfelt thanks, on behalf of all the agricultural workers and members of the UAWK, to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for having turned the country into a dignified nuclear power and an ICBM state.
					
					 They hardened their will to more vigorously conduct various forms of mass movement and socialist emulation drive in order to glorify today's great and special event with increased grain production.

articles.title: World Population Day Marked Here
articles.content:
World Population Day Marked Here
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Tuesday, World Population Day.
					 Present there were officials from the public health and relevant units, representative of the United Nations Population Fund, the United Nations resident coordinator and UNDP resident representative in the DPRK and members of the missions of the international bodies and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Noting that the UN Population Fund set "Family Planning: Empowering People, Developing Nations" as the theme for this year, the speakers expressed expectation that the seminar would mark an important occasion in strengthening the health service for reproduction including the family planning.
					
					 On the same day the Population Centre of the DPRK released its special bulletin "Population News".

articles.title: Newly Developed Health Foods and Koryo Medicines
articles.content:
Newly Developed Health Foods and Koryo Medicines
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang International Sci-Tech Exhibition of Health and Domestic Medical Appliances was held at the Sci-Tech Complex in Pyongyang, the DPRK some days ago.
					 What caught the eyes of its visitors were newly developed health foods and Koryo medicines like black garlic, flavone beauty granules, L-Arabinose and Revitase capsules (3G thrombus medicine).
					
					 Black garlic and its concentrated juice, fermented and ripened by means of biotechnology, have special effects of preventing and treating cancers, pancreatitis and liver diseases. They are also highly effective in raising immunity with strong vascular lavage ability, thus getting popular among housewives and middle- and old-aged people.
					
					 Flavone beauty granules, a mixture of natural compounds, help women relieve from menopausal disorder, while softening complexion. Its effectiveness as a health food was verified through years-long clinical trials carried out by the State Medicine Examination Center and the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					 L-Arabinose lowers blood-sugar levels, promotes the proliferation of beneficial enteric bacteria and is effective in preventing retinopathy, neurological disorder, hypertension, hyperlipemia, coronary artery diseases, etc. originated from diabetes.
					
					 The above-mentioned products were presented by the Kangbong Trading Company.
					
					 According to Ri Kyong Sun, head of a department of the company, it is producing more than 40 kinds of health foods and Koryo medicines by introducing latest technologies of bioengineering, gene engineering and protein engineering, thus contributing to the promotion of the people's health.

articles.title: Papers Hail Successful ICBM Test-Launch
articles.content:
Papers Hail Successful ICBM Test-Launch
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Tuesday say that successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 is a demonstration of the invincible national power and the might of the self-reliant defence industry of the DPRK and an auspicious event to be recorded in its history.
					 The successful test-launch is a shining victory won by the Korean people in the protracted anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. showdown, says Rodong Sinmun in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. applied sanctions, military blackmail and invasion through UN against those countries which incur its displeasure. Its offensive to stifle the DPRK may reach the last phase.
					
					 It is hard for the U.S., however, to use the playing card of military attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 What is ridiculous is the action of the south Korean authorities who are horror-stricken by the success of the ICBM test-launch.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces persistently take issue of the DPRK's measure for self-defense to bolster up the defence capabilities and go reckless in the confrontation with the DPRK despite the latter's warning, they would meet the miserable doom.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary urges the U.S. to clearly see its pitiful situation and the strategic position of the DPRK, come to its senses and make a decision to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK, though belatedly.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Military Moves
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Military Moves
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the U.S. Department of Defense, much scared by the DPRK's success of test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 at one go, had a military attack scenario in the making such as hurling fighters and warships into the waters off the Korean peninsula at the instruction of Trump to prepare diverse countermeasures for coping with "provocation by north Korea".
					 Days ago, the south Korean puppet warmongers staged joint show of ballistic missile fire together with the U.S. master, deliberately escalating the tensions. 
					
					 This shows that the aggressive scenario of the enemies to stifle the DPRK at any cost by sudden nuclear preemptive attack is being carried out at the phase of an actual war, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the invariable wicked intention of the U.S. to mount a nuclear preemptive attack on the DPRK any moment.
					
					 Branding the DPRK's test-launch of ICBM as "threat to world", the U.S. is going busy with the provocative and dangerous military actions. However, it is as foolish as strangling one's windpipe. 
					
					 If the U.S. prepared the plan for military attack to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, the latter has its own-style way for stronger military counteraction and the way for reducing the U.S. into ashes and has already made the full preparation to cope with Trump's frantic military option.
					
					 The south Korean authorities, chiming in with the U.S. attempt for preemptive attack, would not be scot-free if a war breaks out. 
					
					 They should bear in mind that their military confrontation by availing themselves of the U.S. is the self-destructive act of coming into the range of our nuclear strike.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Farce of "Commemorating Second Yonphyong Naval Skirmish" Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Farce of "Commemorating Second Yonphyong Naval Skirmish" Denounced
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The puppet military warmongers and riff-raffs of the ruling and opposition parties of south Korea, in their recent "commemoration of the 15th anniversary of the second Yonphyong naval skirmish" at the command of the second fleet of the navy, incited "security awareness" while viciously faulting the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Tuesday denounces this as a criminal act to cover up their inglorious defeat, fan up the atmosphere of confrontation against the DPRK and further strain the military tension between the north and the south.
					
					 What is at issue is that the present south Korean ruling quarters are openly disclosing their criminal design to stifle the fellow countrymen with the backing of outsiders while dancing to the tune of the conservative forces, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to stop confrontation racket of antagonizing the dialogue partner, if they have a true intent to talk with the DPRK.
					
					 Trumpeting about "dialogue" before doing it would be useless.
					
					 The "commemoration" clearly proves wherein lies the reason why the north-south relations have not made any improvement after the regime change in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are well advised to stop the foolish act of challenging the nation's desire and will for the improvement of the north-south relations and peace and reunification of the country, and behave with discretion.
					
					 Those who encroach upon the inviolable territorial land, sea and air of the DPRK will meet the same fate as those who were buried in the West Sea 15 years ago.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Military Drills against DPRK Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Military Drills against DPRK Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers recently took part in the U.S.-led air drills in Alaska. They set in motion air force including KF-16 fighter bombers formation to stage bomber guided exercises, coordinated precision JDAM dropping drill and air refueling drill targeting the surprise attack at the key facilities of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says that this is a revelation of a criminal intention to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost in collusion with outsiders and it is an open military provocation to the DPRK and an intolerable treacherous act to plunge the nation into nuclear holocaust.
					
					 Cooperation with outsiders and confrontation with the fellow countrymen are as foolish as precipitating self-destruction, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that their reckless act of pursuing the ambition to do harm to the fellow countrymen in hand with outsiders will bring them to the same tragic end as what was met by their predecessors.
					
					 They are faulting the measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence taken by the fellow countrymen as "provocation", far from expressing thanks for the righteous steps to check the U.S. and its followers' barbarous moves against the DPRK and defend the peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly interested in peace of the country and dialogue, they should not toe the outsiders' aggression war moves but try to clear the sky of the Korean peninsula of dark clouds of war and defend the destiny of the nation by pooling its efforts from the stand of national independence.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Junket to U.S. Termed Traitorous One Challenging Nation's Desire and Wish
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Junket to U.S. Termed Traitorous One Challenging Nation's Desire and Wish
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are describing their chief executive's recent visit to the U.S. as a "great success", saying that "Trump supported the resumption of south-north dialogue" and "a proposal that can be responded by the north is in consideration".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says it is truly a shameful act to describe the humbling flattery done for the White House owner and mendicancy shown there as "a great success".
					
					 The south Korean chief executive, abusing the power granted to him by the candlelight demonstrators, made the traitorous junket challenging the nation's desire and wish to end the decades-old domination by outsiders, improve the north-south relations by the efforts of the Korean nation and bring earlier the reunification of the country.
					
					 National reunification is an internal issue from every aspect, and Koreans in the north and the south and abroad are responsible for the settlement of the north-south issue, the national reunification issue.
					
					 The only way for national reunification and prosperity is national independence.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities incite confrontation with the fellow countrymen, defying this truth, and cling to the coattails of outsiders with their back turned on the demand of the candlelight demonstrators, their destination will be the cesspool of history.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korean Regime Not to Run Riot
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korean Regime Not to Run Riot
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A burlesque inciting confrontation with the compatriots in the north by painting a black picture of their epochal event is being staged in south Korea, only to enrage all Koreans.
					 The DPRK's successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 is not only an epochal event which demonstrated the invincible national strength of Juche Korea and its tremendous self-supporting defence industry but also a great event to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation as it is being hailed by all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 But the south Korean chief executive convened a plenary meeting of the "National Security Council", where he "bitterly denounced the north's irresponsible provocation." Not content with this, his regime went so ridiculous as to stage a joint ballistic missile firing drill with the U.S.
					
					 Those in charge of diplomatic and security affairs of south Korea including bosses of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Ministry of Unification are echoing his rubbish, terming the test-launch a "wanton violation of the UNSC resolution."
					
					 The gangsters of the south Korean military in particular are getting hell-bent on escalating confrontation with the DPRK, daring hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership. They staged a farce of announcing a "statement", in which they talked about "provocation" and "destruction."
					
					 It seems that they have all lost their reason, exasperated by the DPRK's great success in the ICBM test.
					
					 When even their master U.S. is finding itself in dilemma, irritated by the remarkable military muscle of the DPRK, those who are no more than puppets of the U.S. are running riot only to provoke side-splitting laughter.
					
					 It is, indeed, a tragic irony that the puppets that can do nothing without an approval of the U.S. as they offered the OPECON symbolic of sovereignty to the U.S. are running amuck to face off with the DPRK possessed of nuclear and hydrogen bombs and even ICBMs.
					
					 They, failing to know what represents the dignity and strength of the nation and how peace on the Korean peninsula has been preserved, should face up to their wretched plight before acting rashly.
					
					 The miserable end met by traitor Park Geun Hye while going foolhardy in escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north is not a thing of the distant past.
					
					 The present regime of south Korea will meet more miserable end if it persists in the hideous confrontation policy like the former regimes, unaware of the changing situation.
					
					 The era of the all-powerful U.S. nukes of violence idolized by the puppet regime has already gone.
					
					 The puppet regime of south Korea had better keep in mind that its foolhardy military confrontation with the DPRK is just a suicidal act of thrusting itself into the nuclear strike range of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Australian Politicians' Offending Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Australian Politicians' Offending Remarks
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Recently, Australian politicians are busy hurling mud at the DPRK over its successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 On July 5 the foreign minister of Australia accused the DPRK of its ICBM test-launch, terming it a "provocative act of violating the UNSC resolution" and "constant threats to regional peace, global security and neighboring countries." Then, the deputy prime minister of Australia unhesitatingly let out provocative remarks that if north Korea launches a nuclear warhead targeted at the U.S., Australia would take part in military actions against it.
					
					 Their accusation is just a manifestation of their ignorance as politicians devoid of any sense of the reality. It is just grumblings of the pro-U.S. conservative politicians blindly following the U.S., indifferent to the will of the Australian people.
					
					 What should never be overlooked is the fact that the pro-U.S. conservatives of Australia are getting frantic in creating "phobia" about the DPRK among Asian countries, describing the rocket launch of the DPRK as a "threat to neighboring countries."
					
					 As already clarified, the DPRK, being a responsible nuclear weapons state, has never posed nuclear threat to other countries and will never do so unless others intimidate it with nukes.
					
					 Contrary to the claims of the conservative politicians, there are assertions among Australia's high-ranking military officers that it is necessary for Australia to take into consideration the fact that its northern areas are definitely within the strike range of north Korea as well as its consequences.
					
					 This means that more realistic, rational and objective judgment is urgently required.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, those, who are not sleeping a sound sleep, exasperated by the DPRK's steps for bolstering nuclear force, are just the U.S. and its vassal forces who have unilaterally posed nuclear threats to the DPRK for decades.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK is just a treasured sword of justice for protecting its sovereignty and rights to development and existence and the peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the region from the U.S. nuclear threats.
					
					 Australian politicians should think twice about the consequences to be entailed by their reckless and irresponsible tongue-lashing.

articles.title: Actions to Remove Social Evils Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions to Remove Social Evils Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters for People's All-out Action and other organizations of south Korea reportedly launched an action for removing social evils at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on July 8.
					 The action was launched all at once in Taejon, Pusan, Taegu, Jeju, South Kangwon, North Chungchong and South Kyongsang provinces and other parts of south Korea as part of the general strike which began late in June.

articles.title: Withdrawal of THAAD Demanded by Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
Withdrawal of THAAD Demanded by Chongryon Officials
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Officials of organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on July 7 and 8 made public statements as regards the fierce actions of south Korean people against THAAD deployment.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said civic and social organizations of south Korea surrounded the U.S. embassy in Seoul on June 24 to strongly demand withdrawal of THAAD deployment threatening peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 Ri Yong Su, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said the U.S. pressure for THAAD deployment and the south Korean authorities' servile moves revealed once again that south Korea-U.S. alliance remains in its name only and south Korea is a colony of the U.S.
					
					 All Korean social scientists in Japan will turn out in the nationwide struggle not to allow the criminal THAAD deployment of the U.S. and south Korean authorities but to check the moves in order to prevent nuclear war danger on the Korean peninsula and defend peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Ryang Ok Chul, vice-chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, declared that officials of the women's union and other Korean women in Japan would never allow the THAAD deployment by the U.S. imperialists and the moves of confrontation with the compatriots by the south Korean authorities following the U.S.

articles.title: Koreans in China Observe 23rd Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise
articles.content:
Koreans in China Observe 23rd Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China and its affiliated organizations held events to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise.
					 Floral baskets were laid at the statue of the President at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin with due ceremony on July 8.
					
					 Present there were Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, and officials of the Jilin Regional Association and officials of the Jilin Provincial People's Government and the Jilin Yuwen Middle School.
					
					 After laying the floral baskets in the name of the General Association and the Jilin Regional Association, the participants paid tribute to the President.
					
					 On the same day officials of the General Association and the Liaoning Regional Association visited the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang of China to lay floral baskes before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On July 7 the chairman of the Zhongnan Regional Association and citizens of the DPRK in Beijing visited the DPRK embassy in Beijing to lay floral baskets at the portraits of the smiling great leaders and pay tribute to them.
					
					 The visitors looked round photos showing the revolutionary careers of the great leaders and the exploits of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un displayed at the embassy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Posted on Website of Chilean Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Posted on Website of Chilean Organization
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Chilean Branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted on its website the brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il on June 19, the 53rd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Greenhouses Visited in Guinea, Indonesia
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Greenhouses Visited in Guinea, Indonesia
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Visits to the Kimilsungia greenhouses took place in Guinea and Indonesia from July 5 to 8 to mark the 23rd demise anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the greenhouses were photos showing the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also works of the great men of Mt Paektu, potted Kimilsungias in full bloom, photos showing the diplomas and medals awarded to the immortal flower at the world's flower shows and exhibitions, and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The personages of various strata and masses from the relevant countries visited the greenhouses.

articles.title: Russian Figure Praises DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Figure Praises DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Thanks to the wise leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un and a large contingent of excellent youth trained by the great leaders, the DPRK will always shed light all over the world as a prosperous youth power with vigor of the youth. The director of the Arton Publishing House of Russia said this on June 26 at the ceremony of releasing respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Is a Proud and Grand Monument to Our Youth and a Symbol of Youth Power".
					 He referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung viewed the issue of youth as an important one relating to the victory or defeat of the revolution from the period when he embarked upon the road of revolution, and put forward the idea and theory of the Juche-based youth movement.
					
					 He said that leader Kim Jong Il trained the youth to be the powerful vanguard of the revolution and reliable reserves of the Party.
					
					 The legendary stories of young heroes created during the building of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station are inseparable from the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, he said.
					
					 The WPK's policy of prioritizing the youth is developing on a new high stage under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, he added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers ran articles on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Egyptian paper Al Akhbar Almassay on July 6 carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, glorious history", which said that his career was the one of a distinguished thinker and theoretician who illuminated the road to be followed by the Korean people and all other progressives of the world, an outstanding strategist who ushered in a new period of upsurge in the anti-imperialist struggle and a great statesman who turned the DPRK into a socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defense.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Kuweta Daily Independent on July 2 ran an article titled "Kim Il Sung, for the global independence", which praised him for setting forth the idea on the global independence and rendering material and moral assistance to the people of various countries liberating their countries from colonial rules and building new societies.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Daily Naurozu in an article titled "Eternal sun of Juche" on July 3 said that the progressives of the world are highly praising him as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 The Kuwaiti paper Kuwait Times on July 5 ran an article praising the revolutionary career, feats and noble traits of the President who greatly contributed to the country, people, times and history.

articles.title: Lectures Given in Various Countries
articles.content:
Lectures Given in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Russia, Romania, Angola, Tanzania and Mexico from June 12 to 19 on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The chief of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea as required by the times while working at the Central Committee of the Party and that he dedicated himself to the country and the people until the last moments of his life.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Zaire Provincial Committee of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola said that the reality of the DPRK that all the people are entrusting their destinies and future to the Party, calling it the mother Party, is really impressive. He added that thanks to the wise leadership of the Party, the Korean people are advancing with confidence, remaining unfazed by the moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Is a Proud and Grand Monument to Our Youth and a Symbol of Youth Power" was brought out in booklet at the Arton Publishing House of Russia to mark the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, a speech delivered by Kim Jong Un at the inauguration ceremony of the power station on Oct. 3, Juche 104 (2015), says that the power station which represents the love of leader Kim Jong Il for the youth and future is a proud creation demonstrating the might of the policy of prioritizing the youth set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It also says that the charging spirit and culture of the youth in the Songun era, the precious treasure of the Korean youth movement, were created during the construction of the power station.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony was held at the publishing house on June 26.

articles.title: Se ofrece banquete por el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14"
articles.content:
Se ofrece banquete por el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14"
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- El Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecieron el dia 10 un banquete opiparo para felicitar el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental.
					Estuvo presente en esta recepcion el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Entre los invitados figuraban los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de ciencias de defensa nacional que contribuyeron al lanzamiento de "Hwasong-14".
					
					Participaron tambien Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente, acompanado por Ri Sol Ju, salio al salon de recepciones de la Casa Mokran y paso revista a la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino junto con el personal que hizo aporte a dicho evento.
					
					Hwang Pyong So pronuncio el discurso de felicitacion.
					
					Por el encargo del Mariscal, Hwang felicito calidamente a los cientificos de defensa nacional que alcanzaron de un salto la cima de fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y defendieron a ultranza el prestigio del CC del PTC al perfeccionar el ICBM de la Corea del Juche y el sistema de poderosa arma estrategica del PTC.
					
					Se refirio a que el Maximo Dirigente habia tomado la decision estrategica de no tolerar mas la continuacion del chantaje nuclear del imperialismo yanqui contra la nacion coreana, que persiste por mas de 70 anos, y de la campana de sancion y presion de toda indole de las fuerzas hostiles y abrir la ruta directa de victoria final al perfeccionar a toda costa el cohete balistico intercontinental que apunta el corazon de EE.UU.
					
					Aunque esta muy ocupado por atender las multiples cuestiones del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el compartio siempre las buenas y las malas con los cientificos y tecnicos del sector de defensa nacional en todo el proceso de desarrollo del "Hwasong-14" siendo disenador general, fabricador general y comisario politico del equipo de desarrolladores, recordo.
					
					Recalco que el trayecto de desarrollo y perfeccion del "Hwasong-14" fue el de creacion de nueva arma estrategica y al mismo tiempo, el de nacimiento del colectivo de cientificos e investigadores de flor y nata del PTC, fila de combatientes fieles, capaz de desarrollar perfectamente en un plazo mas corto cualquier sistema de arma sofisticada que desee el CC del PTC.
					
					Continuo que los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios de la rama deberan apoyar con mayores exitos sustanciales la causa del Partido por la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de tipo jucheano guardando en el alma el honor y la felicidad de hoy.
					
					Llamo a enriquecer el arsenal nuclear de la Corea del Juche mediante el desarrollo continuo y el fortalecimiento cualitativo y cuantitativo del sistema de armas estrategicas al estilo coreano para dar golpe duro a EE.UU. y sus seguidores hasta que estos entreguen el acta de capitulacion a la RPDC.
					
					Por ultimo, exhorto a todos a luchar con energia por la victoria final de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Durante la recepcion, se ofrecio una funcion artistica de la Banda Moranbong.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con la delegacion del partido mexicano
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con la delegacion del partido mexicano
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se reunio el dia 11 con la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, encabezada por el coordinador del Comite de Coordinacion Nacional, Ricardo Cantu Garza, de visita en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena celebraciones de batalla de Yonphyong en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena celebraciones de batalla de Yonphyong en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los belicistas del circulo militar y los tipejos del partido gobernante y los opositores del Sur de Corea efectuaron en la comandancia de la segunda flota de las fuerzas navales la llamada "ceremonia conmemorativa del 15o aniversario de la segunda batalla naval de Yonphyong" en que inculcaron la "conciencia de seguridad" acusando siniestramente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 11, senala que esa celebracion es una locura criminal de los titeres surcoreanos para disimular su derrota vergonzosa, infundir el ambiente conflictivo con la RPDC y agravar la tension militar entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					Lo problematico es que dejandose llevar por las fuerzas conservadoras, los gobernantes actuales exponen abiertamente la intencion criminal de aplastar a la parte connacional con la ayuda de las fuerzas extranjeras, critica el comentarista y continua:
					
					Si tienen de veras la voluntad de dialogar con la RPDC, las autoridades surcoreanas deberan parar su campana conflictiva y hostil a la contraparte.
					
					La ceremonia arriba referida demuestra claramente cual es el motivo por el cual no se mejoran las relaciones intercoreanas aun despues del cambio del "poder" surcoreano.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia dejando sus tonterias que desafian a la aspiracion y la voluntad de la nacion de mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur y lograr la paz y la reunificacion del pais.
					
					Sea quien fuera y tarde o temprano, el que se atreva a invadir el territorio, el mar y el cielo jurisdiccionales de la RPDC sufrira el mismo destino que los provocadores hundidos en el Mar Oeste hace 15 anos.

articles.title: ACNC advierte a politiqueros australianos con sus palabras excitantes a RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC advierte a politiqueros australianos con sus palabras excitantes a RPDC
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- En los ultimos dias, los politiqueros australianos acusaron el exitoso lanzamiento del cohete balistico intercontinental de tipo "Hwasong-14", realizado por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El dia 5, el canciller australiano dijo que el "provocativo lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM" del Norte de Corea es una violacion a la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y "destruye la seguridad regional e internacional y  amenaza invariablemente a los paises perifericos". A su vez, el vicepremier picoteo que "su pais tomara parte en las acciones militares contra el Norte de Corea si este lance la ojiva nuclear contra EE.UU.".
					
					Todas las locuras provocativas de los estadistas australianos con los sentidos lentos sobre la realidad no son mas que una queja de los politiqueros conservadores proyanquis que repiten las palabras de Estados Unidos sin consideracion alguna sobre la voluntad del pueblo australiano.
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que los politiqueros conservadores proyanquis se obstinan en describir sin razones el presente lanzamiento del pais socialista como una "amenaza a los paises perifericos" y hacen esfuerzos desesperados por formar la "fobia" sobre la RPDC entre los paises asiaticos.
					
					Como habia declarado, la RPDC, siendo el responsable pais poseedor de armas nucleares, no ha amenazado ni una vez con el pertrecho nuclear y nunca amenazara a otros que no le amenazan con el mismo pertrecho.
					
					A diferencia de las insistencias de los politiqueros conservadores, la capa militar de alto rango de ese pais opina que "es claro que su region septentrional esta en el alcance de disparo del Norte de Corea" y "es necesario comprenderlo bien inclusive las consecuencias desde el punto de vista militar". Estos criterios exigen el juicio mas realista, sano y objetivo.
					
					Acentuamos una vez mas que quienes se encuentran tan perplejos ante las medidas de la RPDC por el fortalecimiento de fuerzas armadas nucleares, son el pais norteamericano y las fuerzas seguidoras que imponian al pais socialista durante decenios la unilateral amenaza nuclear.
					
					El armamento nuclear de la RPDC es la espada de justicia para defender la soberania y los derechos a desarrollo y existencia del pais y la nacion desde la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y para preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					
					Para los politiqueros australianos es mejor meditar bien las consecuencias de sus palabras ignorantes e irresponsables.
